Unlock your winning potential with 1xBet, where exceptional betting meets extraordinary rewards! Join millions of passionate sports bettors worldwide who trust our secure, licensed platform to deliver an unmatched betting experience.

Begin your journey with a variety of exciting bonuses and seasonal promotions designed to maximize your opportunities and keep the excitement going all year round. From generous welcome bonuses to unique seasonal offers, 1xBet continually delivers thrilling incentives to boost your bets and enhance your overall experience.

As a globally recognized brand, 1xBet is honored to sponsor leading sports clubs and renowned events including FC PSG, FC Barcelona, Serie A, and the prestigious CAF Africa Cup of Nations. These partnerships underscore our commitment to excellence, ensuring you have direct access to the elite action and thrilling opportunities.

Our advanced sportsbook platform delivers exceptional functionality, providing you with extensive betting options, highly competitive odds, and real-time live scores. Feel the thrill of live sports action by streaming your favorite football matches, captivating UFC bouts, and exciting MMA events seamlessly through our integrated match streaming service.

Stay ahead of the competition with in-depth sports statistics and up-to-the-minute football results. From Premier League excitement and Bundesliga intensity to the prestige of the Champions League and the thrill of the NBA, NHL, UFC, and esports competitions, 1xBet arms you with precise information and expert insights.

Don't wait for another moment—download the 1xBet app today, sign up quickly, and join an exclusive global community of sports betting winners. Step into the action with 1xBet and transform every bet into a winning opportunity!

CricFy Football Live Score808 – Live Scores & Fixtures

Stay updated with the latest football Live scores, fixtures, League Table Standings and results from leagues around the world! The Score808 keeps you in the game, live.

Key Features:

* Live Scores & Results: Get real-time updates for matches across all major leagues and tournaments.
* Fixtures & Schedules: Never miss a game with full fixture lists and match times.
* Team & Player Stats: Track your favorite teams and players with detailed stats.
* League Standings: Table of league stats like total points,games played,won,lost,draw e.t.c.
* User-Friendly Interface: Simple, fast, and intuitive navigation.

CricFy Football Live Score808 is the ultimate football companion app for fans who want instant updates anywhere, anytime.

Subscription:

- Monthly Subscription - $24.99


- Yearly Subscription - $49.99



Payment will be charged to the credit card connected to your iTunes Account when you confirm the initial subscription purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current subscription period. With over 20M active users and more than 2K competitions worldwide, you’ll have everything at your fingertips: live minute-by-minute match updates, personalised notifications for your favourite competitions, teams, and players, detailed stats, goals and the latest football news on transfers and the football market.

Don't miss a single match of the Premier League 2025/26 and UEFA Champions League seasons. Get all the live score, goals, stats, and news in our football app.

>> WITH BESOCCER: FOOTBALL LIVE SCORE
• Check today’s match schedules and football results.
• Find out where to watch the matches live.
• Stay connected with direct notifications for the latest news, standout players, teams, and transfer market updates.
• Share your opinions live during matches and on the latest news with our active user community.
• Live analysis and predictions of match results.
• Detailed statistics of each player, team or competition. 
• Images and video summaries of matches, teams or your favourite players.
• Navigate a simple, user-friendly interface with a sleek design.
• New audio commentaries on live matches.

>> CHECK LIVE SCORES, STATS & STANDINGS
Follow football from all over the world, including men’s and women’s competitions:
- Premier League, LaLiga, Serie A, Ligue 1, Bundesliga and other top leagues.
- UEFA Champions League, Europa League, Conference League, FA Cup, Carabao Cup.
- Intercontinental Cup, UEFA Nations League, and many more!

>> ALL THE LATEST FOOTBALL AND TRANSFER MARKET NEWS
Check out all the latest football news and stay up to date on every move:
- Follow confirmed signings and transfer rumours.
- Discover which players are on the radar of Barcelona, Real Madrid, Bayern, PSG and other top European clubs.
- Find out which stars Liverpool, Manchester United, Chelsea, Arsenal and Manchester City are targeting.

>> FULL FOOTBALL FIXTURE SCHEDULES
Get match times for today’s games and upcoming key fixtures. Check past and future matchdays, where to watch the matches live, and stay updated with the latest news.

>>PROBABLES LINEUPS
See all the probables and confirmed lineups for the match live, along with each player´s performance and ratings.

>> SEARCH EVERYTHING YOU NEED INSTANTLY
Use our powerful search engine to find all the data you need on players, teams, and competitions:
- Who has scored more goals: Haaland or Mbappé?
- Who has won more titles: Messi or Cristiano?
- How many goals has Harry Kane scored?
- Which teams have the most league titles? Man City, Man United or Liverpool?
- Who won the last Ballon d’Or?

>> CUSTOMISE THE APP YOUR WAY
Set up the app to match your preferences and receive live notifications for your favourite teams, players, and competitions:
- Live match goals, results, and standings.
- Probable and confirmed line-ups.
- News, signings, and transfer rumours.

----------
Your feedback helps us improve every day!
We constantly enhance the app based on user suggestions and comments.

Our goal is to provide you with the most complete and up-to-date football experience, including live scores, breaking news, and in-depth statistics.
If your favourite league, team, or player is missing, let us know, and we’ll add them! BeSoccer is made for football lovers like you!

With the CricFy TV : Live Score Football app, you can stay updated with soccer live scores and stats, match highlights, and league standings at no cost. We cover matches from the Premier League to the World Cup, ensuring you never miss a moment of the action!

Get real-time score updates, detailed match stats, team standings, and more on your mobile device with our comprehensive football app.

CricFy TV : Live Score gives you access to a world of football, from live scores to in-depth league tables, team statistics, and match results. Discover matches and get detailed stats and live match scores on every game.

WHY CricFy TV : Live Score FOR FOOTBALL FANS?
- Live Sports Scores: Stay updated with real-time scores from matches around the world
- League Standings: View complete league tables with team positions and statistics
- Match Stats: Dive into detailed stats, scores, and team lineups
- Worldwide Coverage: Coverage of major competitions including Premier League, La Liga, Serie A, Bundesliga, and more
- Accurate & Reliable: Trust our up-to-date data from football-data.org API
- Dark Mode: Beautiful dark and light themes for comfortable viewing
- Arabic Support: Full RTL layout support for Arabic users

LIVE MATCHES AND DETAILED STATS
Experience the thrill of football with live scores & stats, comprehensive league standings, and in-depth match analysis.
WORLDWIDE COVERAGE - LIVE MATCH SCORES

ACCURATE AND RELIABLE DATA
Trust in our accurate and up-to-date football data, sourced directly from football-data.org, one of the most reliable football data providers. We are dedicated to delivering the ultimate football experience straight to your fingertips.

Don't just watch the game – live it! Download CricFy TV : Live Score: Live Football Scores & Stats now and elevate your football fandom to a whole new level.
Data Source: All football data is provided by football-data.org API - a reliable and trusted source for football statistics and live scores.

Disclaimer: This app is made for football fans to follow live scores and statistics. The content in this app is not affiliated with, endorsed, sponsored, or specifically approved by any football league or organization. All data is sourced from football-data.org API.

Privacy Policy: https://www.cricfy-app.com/privacy

Stay ahead of every sporting moment with live scores, stats, and schedules. Follow the biggest leagues in the world, including the Premier League, Champions League, La Liga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Brasileirão Série A, and Ligue 1. Track every phase of the NBA, EuroLeague, NCAA, and top tennis tournaments like Wimbledon, Roland Garros, US Open, Australian Open, and the ATP & WTA Tours—all in one app.

Experience the Ultimate Live Score App—Sofascore! Your go-to destination for all scores, sports statistics, and a world of sports excitement! Whether you are a passionate sports fan or a serious football fantasy manager, we have everything, from simple live scores to deep statistics and detailed player analysis. We cover 25 sports (from football and tennis to darts and cricket) and more than 5,000 leagues and tournaments. With the Sofascore app, you won’t miss a thing!

Download Sofascore now and never miss another moment in sports! 

Why choose Sofascore?

• Fast & Precise: Instant notifications, flash scores, and results – enjoy the fastest updates on the planet
• Top Leagues: Stay atop elite competitions with live scores and fixtures & find a complete season overview
• Player Insights: Detailed stats on goals, player performances, and sports events – be the first to know
• Comprehensive Coverage: Dive into all the live scores and fixtures from top leagues and tournaments worldwide

Explore Extensive Sports Features:

• Statistical Ratings: Access over 300 statistics used by pros, news sites, and analysts for a comprehensive view
• Attribute Overview: Visualize key player attributes to gauge their completeness quickly
• Attack Momentum: Track match dynamics and team pressure intensity with a unique graph
• Box Score & ShotMap: Get the details of every match—every point, assist, and shooting pattern
• Power Graph: Witness the flow of matches, showcasing the dominance level of the winning player
• Heatmap: Visualize player movements on the pitch for every match and the entire season
• Head-to-Head: Compare teams and players head-to-head, analyzing their performance history and rivalry

Discover a wide range of sports, leagues and tournaments in the Sofascore live score app:

• Football - Premier League, UEFA Champions League, UEFA Europa League, Bundesliga, LaLiga, Serie A, Ligue 1, Brasileirão Série A, UEFA European Championshio (EURO), FIFA World Cup
• Basketball - NBA, EuroLeague, FIBA World Cup, Stoiximan Basket League, Serie A, Liga ACB
• Tennis - ATP Tour, WTA Tour, Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), Davis Cup
• Table Tennis - ITTF World Table Tennis Championships, Table Tennis World Cup
• Ice Hockey - NHL, KHL, IIHF World Championship
• eSports - LoL, Dota 2, CS:GO 2
• Handball - IHF World Handball Championship, Bundesliga, EHF Champions League
• Volleyball - FIVB Volleyball World Championship, Nations League, Champions League
• Baseball - MLB, LMB, Pro Yakyu - NPB
• American Football - NFL, NCAA
• MMA - UFC, Bellator, KSW, Rizin, PFL
• Motorsport - Formula 1, NASCAR, MotoGP, WRC
• Cricket - ICC World Cup, Indian Premier League (IPL)

and the rest of the sports we cover - Rugby, Darts, Snooker, Futsal, Minifootball, Badminton, Aussie Rules, Beach Volleyball, Water polo, Cycling, Floorball, Bandy.

The Ultimate Sports Entertainment Platform

DAZN is the only truly global pure-play sports entertainment platform. We uniquely integrate the entire fan experience for fans to watch, play, and socialize, all in one place.

Watch Anytime, Anywhere.
Experience sports like never before. Stream your favourite events live or on demand, on any device, from anywhere in the world. DAZN delivers the game to you, wherever you are.

Play in FanZone and Beyond
Dive into the action with FanZone. Chat live, send reactions, and connect with fellow fans in real-time. It’s your front-row seat to the heart of the game.

Connect with Fans
Join the community. Chat with fans, share your passion, and celebrate every victory together. On DAZN, every game is a social event.

DAZN brings you the ultimate sports streaming experience with a world of content available anytime, anywhere:

• Dive into the “Home of Boxing”, featuring top events, schedules, fighter profiles, and exclusive content, including Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship (BKFC).
• Stay up-to-date with the “Schedule” feature, setting alerts for your favourite games across sports like American Football, Basketball, and Tennis.
• Navigate effortlessly with the new sub-navigation bar to quickly access your favourite competitions like Serie A. 
• Get real-time “Stats and Scores” for all games, including Men’s Football, the National League, and major tournaments like the NFL Game Pass and Courtside 1891.
• Explore full “Fight Cards” for boxing and MMA events, including the Professional Fighters League (PFL), and revisit past rounds with a single click.
• Engage with fans in the “FanZone” by cheering, chatting, sending reactions, and participating in polls.
• Manage your account with ease using the updated profile section.
• Browse and watch a variety of live channels with the EPG for live channels feature, including content from Red Bull TV, Padel TIME TV, and thrilling events like Riyadh Season.

DAZN holds the world’s largest portfolio of sports broadcasting rights, including:
• History-making fights from Matchroom Promotions, Queensbury, Golden Boy Promotions, and BKFC.
• Exclusive access to NFL Game Pass, bringing every game of the NFL.
• European football including Serie A and National League.
• NHL.TV: Experience every game from every team, live and on demand all season long. The world’s best hockey, all in one place.
• All the action from the NCAA College Football season.
• Basketball action, including Courtside 1891.
• The best of live Women’s Football, including Liga F, NWSL, and Frauen-Bundesliga.
• Exciting MMA content from the Professional Fighters League (PFL), Naciones MMA, and more.
• Unique sports like Padel, global tournaments in Tennis, and diverse events like Riyadh Season.
• Over 10 linear TV channels on our platform with 24/7 content, including Red Bull TV, Matchroom Snooker, Lacrosse TV, and more.
• A rich library of video-on-demand (VOD) content, including sports documentaries, features, and shows.

DAZN is your gateway to sports, bringing you closer to the action than ever before.

Tipstar is the Football Betting Genius!
We provide football matches predictions thanks to predictive algorithms and our football gurus team. 

You'll read the predictions developed by our experts and know with absolute precision their odds which are based on their statistics. Turning notifications on you'll receive real time predictions by the gurus you decide to follow and never miss their tips.

Choose your favorite team to quick access relevant information and the latest news. Use the in-app chat to exchange opinions about matches with other users and to talk to our gurus.

Our algorithms process predictions relying on complex math models as Poisson Distribution, ELO ranking and goal difference match ratings applied to a more than 100.000 matches data set.

We compute football odds uniquely on a statistical basis. The comparison of our odds with bookmakers' odds can be used to discover value bets. 
For live matches bettors we do provide livescores and fixtures along with lineups.

Results, Leaderboards and detailed statistics will let you analyze form, home/away and halftime tables for every team in every seaspon since 93-94.

We do cover more than 22 of the most important European Championships such as:

● UEFA Champions League 
● UEFA Europa League 
● Italian Serie A e Serie B
● Spanish La Liga BBVA and Liga 2 
● English League, Championship, League 1, League 2 
● French Ligue 1 and Ligue 2 
● German Bundesliga and Bundesliga 2 
● Dutch Eredivisie 
● Portuguese Primeira Liga 
● Turkish Süper Lig 
● Belgian Pro League 
● Greek Souper Ligka 
● Scottish Premiership, Championship

Tipstar PRO is available through autorenewable subscriptions.
You can cancel your subscriptions anytime with no extra money.

You cannot cancel the current subscription during the active subscription period. Any unused part of time-span of a free trial period will be forfeited as soon as you purchase a subscription.

AiScore is your Live score expert, bringing to you more information, more statistics and a completely new experience on your smartphone. Here you are even informed faster than the TV viewers!

With In-depth coverage of football, basketball, tennis and snooker, AiScore brings you live score,goals, yellow or red cards, H2H, fixtures, match live, team and player stats, standings, lineups and other important stats from English Premier League, Spanish La Liga, UEFA Champions League, NBA, FIBA, Basketball Champions League, ATP tennis, WTA tennis, World Snooker Championship - major or small leagues and competitions all over the world!

TOP HIGHLIGHTS:

*All Games - Follow all today's matches in real time. Also, you can check out the matches on specific day by DateTime Picker.

*Live - Stay up to date with all the latest scores and results from hundreds and thousands of games worldwide. Every score at a glance. Just tap the matchup for Box Score or Lineups, H2H and Match Live.

*Favorites - Choose your favorite team and competition on matchup and always be up-to-date.

*Instant Notification - Get instant notifications of goal, corner, red or yellow card, start, starting lineups and final results for all live or your followed matches. A pop-up window will appear to inform you of score changing when you turn on the "Score Reminder”.

*Leagues - In-depth coverage of leagues, cups and tournaments from over 200 countries. Check out latest rankings, standings, team or player stats and more.

Football: Over 2,600 different football matches, over 37,000 teams (including Premier League, Champions League, Serie A, La Liga, Bundesliga, MLS, FA Cup, League Cup, Europa League, Championship and many more)

Basketball: Over 500 tournaments including FIBA Basketball World Cup, NBA, BCL

Tennis: Complete source for worldwide tennis matches including ATP, WTA

Snooker: Complete source for worldwide snooker matches including World Championship, UK Championship, Masters

*Chatroom - Get connected with other sports fans from all over the world. No game is boring if you can chat live.

*Language - 28 (more will be added)

app_name: 得物 - 得到美好事物
developer: Shanghai Dewu Information Group Co., Ltd.
description:
得物App是集潮流装备、潮流商品鉴别、潮流生活社区于一体的新一代潮流网购社区。 
-鉴别服务开创者- 
得物App在传统电商模式的基础上添加“鉴别服务”，实现“先鉴别，后发货”的购物流程。“多道鉴别查验工序”的平台品控，为新世代消费者带来更安心的网购体验。 
-潮流网购- 
得物App签约了数百位业内具有多年以上经验的潮流商品鉴别师。鉴别师除了是骨灰大神级Sneaker玩家和潮人，更是潮流领域的“研究人员”。通过对球鞋、服装、配饰、潮玩、数码3C、美妆等产品进行系统性研究，包括资料收集、数据对比、档案建立、样本拆解和仪器检测等，力保鉴别的准确性。还设有独立的查验环节，对存在瑕疵的商品进行排查，拦截明显瑕疵商品，针对存在微小瑕疵的商品与用户提前一对一沟通，确保用户购买到经鉴别查验为无瑕疵商品。 
• 潮流单品：得物App目前支持交易的潮流单品品类丰富。 
• 竞价模式：得物App采取商品竞价出价的平台交易模式，竞价模式提供了每个用户获得公平交易机会。 
• 商品3D全息空间：得物App采集球鞋的3D影像展示。用户浏览实现可操控式自转，720度无死角查看单品的材质、图案、纹理、设计细节，为用户打造不一样的沉浸式购物体验。 
-潮流生活社区- 
得物App致力于打造年轻人的潮流生活社区，成为中国潮流文化风向标和年轻人的发声阵地。得物App社区聚集了一众明星以及潮流圈内数百位知名KOL。我们以球鞋和时尚话题作为潮流文化的切入点，持续沉淀潮流向内容，培育潮流文化沃土。得物App社区积极拓展符合年轻人消费观的品类内容，深度挖掘年轻人处于萌芽期的兴趣点。 

了解更多得物App相关，可通过以下方式： 
官方微博：得物App 
官方抖音：得物App 
微信公众号：得物App 
微信小程序：得物App 
意见反馈：打开得物App-我-设置-反馈与建议

À l'occasion des événements sportifs au Maroc, un écosystème numérique innovant a été développé pour offrir aux supporters, visiteurs, volontaires et organisateurs une expérience 100% digitalisée. L'application YALLA est le compagnon de l'ensemble des grands événements sportifs organisés ou coorganisé par la Fédération Royale Marocaine du Football au Maroc.
YALLA offre la possibilité de :
- Créer et gérer le FAN ID, indispensable pour accéder aux stades et Fan Zones
- Déposer une demande d'e-Visa en ligne si nécessaire.
- Accéder aux actualités, programmes et informations pratiques liées aux événements sportifs.
- Consulter les services liés à l'organisation : transport, hébergement et activités.
- Rester informé en temps réel des mises à jour officielles.
YALLA centralise tous les services numériques afin que chaque participant profite pleinement des compétitions sportives au Maroc.

The NBA App is your home for the season.

Get free, instant access to the latest schedule, scores, highlights, news, and behind the scenes stories from across the National Basketball Association.

In the free NBA App, fans get access to:
- Live scores, stats and standings
- The latest basketball news, highlights, game previews and recaps.
- The full season schedule across national and local broadcast partners.*
- Stories from across the NBA to bring you closer to the action.
- Watch original series that bring you inside the league
- Personalized live updates on your favorite teams and players
- Live free access to postgame press conferences after every game
- Play free games to test your basketball knowledge with NBA Play

* National broadcast partners include ABC, ESPN, NBC, Peacock, and Amazon Prime Video. 

Want even more? Watch live games with NBA League Pass and stream your favorite NBA teams and players.

NBA League Pass subscribers have access to:
- Streaming NBA games live and on-demand.**

- Overlays with player stats, scores of other games, and live odds without leaving the game
- Mobile optimized game streams for phones and tablets

- Access to the NBA archives to stream the most memorable games and moments.

League Pass Premium subscribers get access to:
- Gametime is anytime with download for later to watch NBA games on the go or offline.
- Commercial free viewing on up to 3 devices
- In-Arena Entertainment at game breaks, so you feel like you are there.

** Blackouts and restrictions apply in the US and Canada.

Get the best free NBA coverage, including pre-season games, global games, NBA Emirates NBA Cup, Christmas Day games, NBA All-Star Weekend and All-Star Game, NBA Playoff games, NBA Finals, NBA Draft, NBA Summer League, and NBA 2K League. The official NBA app features highlights of every shot, dunk, nothing but net, and more from the Atlanta Hawks, Boston Celtics, Brooklyn Nets, Charlotte Hornets, Chicago Bulls, Cleveland Cavaliers, Dallas Mavericks, Denver Nuggets, Detroit Pistons, Golden State Warriors, Houston Rockets, Indiana Pacers, LA Clippers, Los Angeles Lakers, Memphis Grizzlies, Miami Heat, Milwaukee Bucks, Minnesota Timberwolves, New Orleans Pelicans, New York Knicks, Oklahoma City Thunder, Orlando Magic, Philadelphia 76ers, Phoenix Suns, Portland Trail Blazers, Sacramento Kings, San Antonio Spurs, Toronto Raptors, Utah Jazz, and Washington Wizards.

Purchase NBA League Pass or NBA TV, and you will be automatically billed through Apple every 30 days (monthly packages) or every 365 days (annual packages) until you cancel your subscription. Refunds are not available after subscriptions have been activated.
